website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive set for those looking to get started with golf. Nice selection of clubs here.
pros: Sold as either left- or right-handed sets
Irons have perimeter weighting that helps steer off-center ball strikes
Includes a driver, a fairway wood, a hybrid, 5-irons, a putter, a bag, and headcovers
Smart price point for those who are just trying golf for the first time

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I barely qualify as a beginner golfer, but I am quite adept at researching. lol I only had a couple days to practice with these before I played a fun scramble. These are incredibly forgiving and swing quite nicely. If you are a beginner these are your saving grace.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Good for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I had previously played golf a handful of times and decided I was ready to really take on the sport. I purchased this set and have been very happy with it. It is basic and doesn't have every club you could possibly need, but for someone just starting out and wanting to see if golf is for them, I would recommend. I the bag it is light and comes with the backpack style carrying straps. The only negative is I wish the bag had more pockets. There is only one small pocket which I use for tees and ball makers and they all get mix up and it can be tough to find what I want without taking everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Had to leave my good clubs home. Bought these to avoid having to find L handed rentals for the next 1 1/2 years. I put a larger grip on the putter (4/5 stars) and jumbo grips on the rest of the clubs. Compared to my "good" clubs, these feel somewhat dead on most shots. The exception is the 3 wood. Don't know why but the club is magic...almost impossible for me to miss with it. For what I paid, they are certainly adequate. Bag is a cart bag...not a carry bag and the shoulder strap is very awkward to use. Overall...adequate...I got what I paid for and a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: lefttee

customer_reviews.title: These Tall Clubs are MUCH longer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm VERY happy with these golf clubs. All of the clubs are longer, in fact, most of the clubs are 1-3/4" longer than my previous Mens' Standard length clubs. Most other brands only offer +1" longer clubs which would have been too short for me. Thanks Wilson!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners set.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Just started playing golf at 41 yrs old and I’ve played 3 rounds of golf with these plus multiple driving range visits. Was surprised how fast I was able to get some consistently good drives with the driver. Bought a cheap sand wedge and that’s the only thing I wish wasn’t missing from this set. I would also upgrade the putter when you can but otherwise I like it. Golf bag is holding up so far as well. Great beginners set, very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: Driver head broke off
customer_reviews.text: This is decent beginner set. The irons are all right, the hybrid and fairway wood are good. I started really getting used to the driver when the head broke off rather easily. A little disappointing to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: jip3211

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad set of beginners clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad set of beginners clubs. I bought these as a second set. The driver is a little short for me. My Taylor is an inch longer. I'm not that great of golfer to begin with but I can hit it farther and straighter with my old driver. But the rest of the clubs are fine. I'll just practice a bit more with the driver and see what happens. All in all worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John H. McCorts

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for our daughter
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our 15 year old daughter. She has very long legs, but doesn’t swing very hard, so the golf pro recommended a senior flex, and told us these were good clubs for the amount we wanted to spend. She was able to hit the ball much better and further than with her women’s clubs. The only down side has been the bag. It is a cart bag, and she has to walk the course in high school golf. Also, there are very few pockets on the bag- the one small pocket it does have, has a faulty zipper. Other than that though, they have been great!
customer_reviews.author: cls3442

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with my first set
customer_reviews.text: Recently picked up golf and decided to go with these because it seemed like a quality set that wouldn’t break the bank. Absolutely love these bad boys. Lightweight, well made, and stylish bag. Solid clubs with comfortable grips. Well rounded set to get you out on the course and not overthink your game. Highly recommend to anyone who is looking to get out there, dial in your swing, and have a blast. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Wilson Profile Platinum... Amazon Exclusive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice starter set of Golf Clubs and Bag! Now I must get to the driving range!
customer_reviews.author: Ronj

customer_reviews.title: High quality clubs for a great price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just wow. When I pulled the clubs out of the box, I couldn't believe how lightweight the whole thing was. I have been twice so far with these clubs and they have been so much better than my old clubs. I am 6'4 and was having the hardest time finding clubs with an extra inch for me. I pulled the trigger on these and the clubs just feel like very high quality clubs. I love the look of the bag and the driver has increased my range by a decent amount. There are plenty of pockets and the stand works fantastic. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Neilson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with this new set.
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre at best. I had started playing golf with clubs I purchased at rummage sale a few years ago. This Wilson set was supposed to be an upgrade; but utterly disappointed especially with the driver. The paint started coming off from the driver head in a couple of days. My old driver got me 200 yards on average, the new Wilson 25 - 50 yards shorter! Bottom line: never purchase items like these looking at the ratings and reviews but only after trying them out. I should have snatched one when Costco had a club set available
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Beginner quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value. The quality is strictly beginner. But that is what I am. I’ll spend the bucks when I’m sure I want to continue.
customer_reviews.author: stuart silbert

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. $300 really is too good to be true for a full set of clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have to give a bad review. This was a $300 full set of Wilson golf clubs. The 6 iron came flying off at the driving range the first day I used it. It was probably the 5 time I hit the ball in total and it came flying off. Completely caught me by surprise. At least as luck would have it, I was videoing myself in slow motion as I’m a beginner and wanted to analyze my swing. I was able to get proof of the head flying off. There was non tampering or abusive treatment of the iron beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: hofston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a BDay gift & was very well received. He's a novice golfer & also left-handed, so the value for the $ was spot-on. He loves having a nice set to take to the course! Also purchased a few accessories, so he's thrilled. Only time will tell about the durability (negative reviews), but here's to hoping they last until he wants an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: This club set did not work well for me at all. The pitching wedge face broke off after 1 use of these clubs. After about a week of playing the 6 and 7 iron bent at the shaft. Not buying anymore wilson products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you are just getting started!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a complete hack and this set is nice and a good set to get your foot in the tee box. Clubs have a quality feel and grips are decent but a glove gives you that extra grip to rip!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Got to love these clubs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these clubs after not playing for over a decade. At 6'2", these are about 1.5 inches longer than regular clubs. Ideal for me after having back trouble! The grips are oversized and very comfortable. I would recommend this set for any senior player or tall player. I've only been able to use a couple of clubs in the backyard due to winter, but with winter breaking, watch out!!
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with driver and hybrids
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first set as the driver head broke off after about 20 swings on the driving range. The return process via Amazon was terrific and easy. I topped a drive with the second set and have a nice dent in the 2nd driver. At this point I am not returning them, but this is really unacceptable. The irons are much more solid than the driver and hybrids. Overall at this price I'm not necessarily happy about the quality, but the clubs are reasonably priced for someone new or getting back into golf.
customer_reviews.author: RL26

customer_reviews.title: Great starter or intermediate set
customer_reviews.text: Just getting back into golf after a 15 year layoff. These get the job done and then some. Can't beat this set for the price, just go for it if you're on the fence. Clubs are very solid and even the bag is stylish and very functional, has auto stand, very nice feature. As they used to say in the nineties, this is a "no brainer".
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good clubs for a great price
customer_reviews.text: At first I was not sure what to expect from these clubs. However, after receiving them and taking them to the course, this is a solid set of clubs for the average golfer especially for the price it is at. Irons and wedges look and feel good and the bag is comfortable and light to carry. Only criticism is that the driver, wood, and hybrid look somewhat cheaply made, which is to be expected for the price. However, the clubs perform well despite their appearance. This is a great set for average golfers who arent looking to break the bank and want to get out on the course and have a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Are these the best clubs you can buy...of course not, a good wedge will cost you $160 but for a beginner this combination set is a great value and the quality for the money is more than expected. The bag and putter alone are nearly worth it. I bought these for my son and expect they'll last 2-3 years before he wants to upgrade. It is an excellent way to get someone into the game of golf w/out laying out a ton of cash. If it turns out he doesn't continue to play I'm out a few hundred dollars and I can spend that myself in 3-4 rounds of golf.
customer_reviews.author: MoTown

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: After taking up golfing over the past few years, I realized I was getting good enough to graduate to a better set. So I didn’t lots of research and testing to find the best clubs for me. I was willing to pay a lot more than I did for a top notch set. But ultimately found these on a Black Friday deal. This set did not disappoint. My golf game immediately got better. I would highly recommend this set to anyone transitioning out of their starter set into an intermediate set. Or anyone simply looking for a quality set of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: robsbombs

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for someone just starting out. I have only used them once so far so I can't speak to how long they will last, but I played 18 holes, half in the rain and half in the sunshine and these clubs performed very well. I am still new to the game but these things have me zero issue and a couple of really solid shots. The bag seems pretty sturdy, and the clubs feel pretty good too. If you're just starting out these are a pretty good way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wilson Golf Men's Ultra Complete Package Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the money. I bought these clubs for my 19 year old son who is getting into golf. He is 5'9" and these fit him well. He is already smashing balls at the range. The set is an excellent value for the money and I am sure it will give him years of service. As for the complaints of dents on the woods? Stop teeing up your balls so high and learn to hit. This can happen to all levels of woods if you tee the ball to high and dont hit correct. We have had no such issue and my son is a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great little starter set
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a great little starter set that got me out playing again after several years out of the game. Irons are actually really good and compare with much more expensive clubs. The woods and hybrid are perfectly usable but less quality as could be expected at the price. The wedges are not as forgiving as the irons, which made the transition from the great irons to wedges tricky, but hey could just be my swing!! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mark d lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Love these clubs. Perfect set for a beginner golfer or someone on a budget. These clubs made lots of divets in the dirt and haven't shown any sign of wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H

customer_reviews.title: Great set, average golf bag. Good quality driver and clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great overall golf set. I play once a month and I like how they feel and play. Driver is pretty good. I am giving this a 4/5 for great clubs but a cheap golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hitesh

customer_reviews.title: Great set only thing is that it needs a sand ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set only thing is that it needs a sand wedge but I managed with the pitcher they gave me all around a good set for beginners not to much money and they really are crafted well
customer_reviews.author: Ryan LeSage

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This set is great for the leisure player or the beginner. Durable, accurate, relable.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Good for casual fun
customer_reviews.text: I was only going to buy a driver at a sporting store but there cheapest driver was almost 200 bucks so I figured I'd get this hole set. I've only had it to the driving range a few times but the seem nice. the irons seem a bit short but maybe that's how there supposed to be. idk. Over all they seem good for what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: TIM TEBOW

customer_reviews.title: Badly aligned grips
customer_reviews.text: Surely Wilson could send clubs with grips properly aligned. While this might seem a stupid complaint to someone who doesn't golf, anyone who DOES golf would understand why it matters. There was not even consistency in the misalignment, and the putter was even misaligned. Great bag and strap system, decent clubs for the money, but my son noticed the grip issue immediately.
customer_reviews.author: B Shuford

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas. He absolutely loves them. He is just getting back into the golf game and he needed a new set of clubs. These were very reasonably priced and came with pretty much everything he needed to golf. The bag carries like a back pack so it's a lot easier to carry the bag from one location to the next. The bag is actually very nice as well as the clubs. I would encourage anyone who is learning to golf or just picking up the game again to purchase these clubs! These are a steal!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not someone who played golf growing up. I’ve hit balls at the range before but it never went very well. I’ve only had the chance to hit with this club set once at the range so far, but man, is it a good set for a beginner. If I can get my swing figured out, these will make the game much more enjoyable for me. The irons are forgiving and the fairway wood seems like an awesome addition. Still struggling with the hybrid, but it’s mostly down to my swing. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product - 3 irons bent after 3 rounds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to get back out on the golf course. I'm not good by any means, but know how to handle the clubs and hit the ball. Yet after only three trips to the golf course, 3 of my irons (6, 8, and 9) are bent where the shaft meets the head of the club (called the ferrule). Either this is a manufacturing defect or simply a very bad product. Either way, I strongly advise against purchasing this set. I will contact Wilson on Monday when their customer service line is open. Hopefully they will fix the issue. Until then, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoshify

customer_reviews.title: for tall men +1
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these clubs for my son as a gift, came in on time. Drivers are shorter than his regular clubs, pw and sw are also shorter. Sent back for a refund, very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: John Evans

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: To start, the product was delivered upside down, which put all the weight on the driver, ruining the shaft. Additionally, all the grips are attached off center. This makes the putter line up completely crooked. This is a testament to the poor quality. It is disappointing at almost $500 to receive clubs that are gripped improperly. The set of Callaway Stratas I used to have were of better quality in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great beginning set.
customer_reviews.text: A great set of beginning clubs. My only complaint is that the driver seemed short and the club head dented after about 5 trips to the driving range. It feels like more time and effort we’re spent on everything but the driver. I ended up buying a higher quality driver. However, everything else is great, no issues. I love the bag, the irons, the putter, the hybrid and the fairway wood. it’s lightweight and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: My first very own set as a new golfer. I've played a few rounds renting and decided to pull the trigger. Absolutely great set in my opinion. Light weight and durable. (As they are being beaten from a new golfer) I would recommend this to anyone that is new to the sport. Only negative thing to say is that my 7 iron did come a little bent from the actual head to shaft, however I still use and it does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: luciano reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality set for the price tag. Have taken it to the range and played 18 hole coarses multiple times. Had to purchase a 5 iron seperately but not reducing a star for it since the set initself is worth the price. Definitely recommend it for beginners or even intermediate golf players.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for the beginner golfer. Driver shaft is way too soft for my swing and I replaced almost immediately but would be good if you had a slow swing. Irons are nice and forgiving with the cavity back. Putter is pretty nice too. The 5 hybrid is ok when I can hit it but will probably put another iron in its place like a 5. Overall good package for someone looking to just test the waters on if golfing is for them.
customer_reviews.author: Rc man

customer_reviews.title: Decent Clubs
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are comfortable and hit nicely for my first set! There are enough clubs for anything a beginner will want, in my opinion. If I take golf seriously enough, I'll pick up more clubs over the next few years for different hits I want. I really like the bag too, lots of pockets, a stand to hold itself up. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Switala

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good looking clubs and feel great. Overall pretty happy with the purchase minor a few issues, the driver has a few scratches and the putter came in a different color than the yellow (rest of the clubs) that is advertised. Not a deal breaker but pretty annoying to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Good set for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a beginner for the money. You get what you need to get started out of the gate. Not an overly quality set, but not something that is cheap junk. The bag is very nice as well. Good amount of pockets, plenty of storage space. Clubs feel nice and are well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Hilfa

customer_reviews.title: He's thrilled with the set and said it is just as good as a set of Callaways
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these golf clubs! He's thrilled with the set and said it is just as good as a set of Callaways!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, but poor quality driver
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it has a good selection of clubs that you need to start playing golf. The irons are well-made. The bag is light-weight. It is a good product for the price. However, the paint job on the driver and hybrid were poor, and the driver dented after only 3 swings!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for a birthday gift for my husband. His old set was stolen and it was time for an upgrade anyway. He did his research on them. So, I knew which set to buy. No regrets on the purchase. The color is nicer in person than in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Diamonds & Pearls

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I understand this is a "Senior" Set of clubs, but they feel light, flimsy, and very low quality. I bought a Amazon Warehouse Used set for under $100, a fair price. Way over priced at $350 for a new set. This set is just not worth that much.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Getting back into the swing of things and this works great!
customer_reviews.text: Been away from golf for years and started going back at the driving range. This set works perfectly. Well balanced and sturdy. Has flexibility in the shafts that gives my shots that extra push. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A. Berthelot

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent starter set of clubs for the beginner Golfer. I bought these for my son-in-law to use when we play golf together as he doesn't play often, but, he does well with this set. It definitely beats using Pro shop rental clubs.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL A. GOGUEN

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Bag for a tall Guy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Irons and Putter. Driver is a cheap one (to be expected for the Price), the bag has also started to show signs of wear after only a month of use. All in all. A very nice bag of clubs
customer_reviews.author: sfguy87

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: It's not even a week after I bought it, and it starts to fall apart during the swing and almost hit someone. IT IS DANGEROUS AND NOT OKAY IN TERMS OF PRODUCT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce J.

customer_reviews.title: The putter feels great.
customer_reviews.text: I've played several rounds of golf with friends using their clubs and I finally decided it was time to get my own. Having played before I'm not brand new to the game, but I still have PLENTY of room for improvement. The first thing I'd have to say about these is that they are definitely worth the money. The driver performs well and the irons feel durable. I can't get over how much I love the putter. It's nice and heavy with a fantastic squared off grip. All in all, it's definitely worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this set but after receiving them , I’m really impressed and happy with the quality. Nice sturdy clubs , really nice bag, a great value for the price. I would recommend. I have gone to the range and played 18 holes with them and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price, some clubs wearing out after a couple hundred swings
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice and light with a lot of pockets, and the clubs perform pretty well. I purchased the clubs 3-4 months ago and played 6 rounds of nine holes and been to the driving range 20ish times, but now the 6 and 7 iron's heads are breaking loose from the shaft. Additionally, if you top the ball on a few of your drives, you will definitely bend up the driver head.
customer_reviews.author: Brewbog

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase these!
customer_reviews.text: Started golfing couple months ago. Decided to pick these up because of the price. 300$ is definitely too good to be true for a full set of clubs. I read another review about the head of another buyers 6 iron flew off. Same exact thing happened to me, on 4th time use. So I refunded these and paid extra for Cobra clubs. If you are serious, pay extra and get a better brand. They will last much longer. There was also no misuse of the clubs, I treated them with care, driver dented easily and 6iron completely broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for my husband who is a beginner. The set appear to have every thing a beginner needs. Also it has extra with the bag which has a stand so he can set the bag down without falling.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Lankin

customer_reviews.title: Beginner set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend. He has never golfed. Bent up the bottom of the driver the first time out hitting a bucket of balls on the grass. Other than that they have worked well. We have gone out 3 times in a week. He is addicted to the game. We will upgrade when he gets better.
customer_reviews.author: Mel was here

customer_reviews.title: I played golf my whole life. I bought these for my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been golfing for my whole life. I bought these for my boyfriend for his birthday. These are a great set to learn with, he will play with these for a few years. These clubs are very nice. Even the driver and woods/hybrids are nice. The putter is a putter you learn with!! A lot of people think you need the nicest clubs to play golf, you don’t. These clubs are all around very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jayci Stonebraker

customer_reviews.title: Hey hey
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened to some of the other golfer's drivers in their sets, but I just used it on 9 holes and it worked perfectly! Played my best 9 holes yet (disclaimer: this was my 3rd time golfing 🤣) shot a 51 on a 34 par course so take what you want from that 😁
customer_reviews.author: Saimei Kinjo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my son. He just started playing golf and so far he loves them. They seem to be holding up really well. The bag is light weight so they are easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the price and the extra length made a big difference in my game.
customer_reviews.author: Andi. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of beginners clubs
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are a great set of clubs for beginners or anyone not wanting to spend a ton of money on new clubs. I have played golf on and off for over 20 years and these are one of the best sets of clubs I have played with. You can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Woolsey

customer_reviews.title: Looking for descent set of Clubs this is it..
customer_reviews.text: Just received Clubs. Have to say the was a steal of a a price for Amazon Prime Day. Got entire set for $120!! Irons are the best part of package.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Love these clubs. I was hitting some cheap walmart clubs, but these things are league's above.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lee Philen

customer_reviews.title: Personal and Particular review
customer_reviews.text: If you are taller than 5.8" with this set, people believe you are a junior
customer_reviews.author: WMon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love these clubs! I purchased them because I had left my Golf clubs home when we traveled to PA. I wanted to play golf with my Grandsons so I purchased them on Amazon. I am a duffer but the clubs felt great and I hit the balls well. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners and beyond
customer_reviews.text: As new to golf I can’t think of anything more I would need for the next couple of years. Besides, the whole set, including the bag, look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mourad

customer_reviews.title: Everything besides driver excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Driver head flew off after 3 holes of use.Don't know if I had a defect or what but I've never had a head fly off with that little use. Rest of the set is solid!
customer_reviews.author: ZED350

customer_reviews.title: mens's tall - longer than my old ones
customer_reviews.text: only been out a few times but my game has drastically gotten better. im 6'3" and had to bend down too far with my old clubs that my swings were very incosistant. very amature player. this club set is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set if you are tall or have long limbs
customer_reviews.text: I am 6' with long arms and torso. I am also a beginner. Moving from rental clubs to this was the best idea I have had when it comes to golf. They will last me a season or two; then I will slowly start to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Good value good set
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. A good set of clubs for the money. My nephew is new to golf and I didn’t want to spend a lot of money until I knew he would like it. He loves his clubs.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great begginner set
customer_reviews.text: Just getting into golf, and bought this set because of the good reviews. I believe that it definetely is a good start... I dropped a star because the bag doesn't come with a cover, so the clubs keep falling off... Other than that, great
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Estevez

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get started at a really good price! The bag was lightweight and had a lot of storage, while the clubs perform very well. My friend is pretty good and he was amazed by the performance - and he plays a lot more expensive equipment! Very happy with the quality, but I suppose Wilson wouldn't make anything bad - I know they are super high quality for all the sport categories they make equipment for.
customer_reviews.author: Lars X Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Either I got a defective set, or they’re horribly made.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the first day on the range and the head flew off the driver and the hybrid broke at the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son at Christmas. He was thrilled and loves them. A lot of product and good quality for the price. I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lombard

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Have only played with them once. So far, so good. Good clubs for the value. Doesn't have all the irons that you would normally want in a complete set but perfect for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of beginner clubs! I’ve had them a little over 3 weeks playing roughly about 10 times & love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I really like these clubs! Just waiting on the spring so I can get out more! Hope to play more ofter for the hubs great quality for the price. My husband was impressed and he plays all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for a few rounds.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a second set for vacation home use. Forgiving, easy to play with. Standard Chinese quality.
customer_reviews.author: GRF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it, definitely the best budget set of clubs. Definitely not high end driver, however the fairway woods are decent and the irons get the job done. Would invest in new driver and putter though.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.  Good value
customer_reviews.text: Only issue was my son came down and missed the ball - hit the top of the ball with the bottom of the driver and dented it. It is a very light weight set. Great for beginners and the person who golfs a few year.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels 142

customer_reviews.title: Good for money just wish it had more irons
customer_reviews.text: Really good set of clubs for the price I only wish it came with more irons or at least a 5 iron. I went from using hammy down clubs from the 70s to this and it was a night and day difference. Everything is super light on it so if your walking it’s almost like they arnt there
customer_reviews.author: Dustin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice beginner set, look nice, feel great swinging them, really can't find anything bad about them at all
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Fine for beginners
customer_reviews.text: These are fine for my 12 year old that is just learning the game. The driver head dented on the 4th trip to the range, but until he finds his swing, it’ll suffice.
customer_reviews.author: bruinsfan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: On just my 3rd golf outing, both the Driver and the FW broke. If you're looking at getting this set because of the price, just know that you will have to add the cost of replacement clubs. The only redeeming quality of this set is the bag. Overall, my advice would be to stay away and spend your money on better quality clubs. You'll save in the long run that way.
customer_reviews.author: Indio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Have used the set multiple times now and love it. I am getting bettwr and will probably upgrade in next few years but will enjoy these clubs till i do.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gryczka

customer_reviews.title: Swing and a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding clubs for a casual player. Very nice sleek yellow and black (especially for a Steeler fan :) ). Great handles on the bag and plenty of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: HGBeeko

customer_reviews.title: Great basic set
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set! Everything you need to get started playing.
customer_reviews.author: dmOde

customer_reviews.title: Great for just getting started
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and the clubs look awesome. The bag isn't top of the line but i would put it miles ahead of any beginners set bag that I've seen. The two legs that let it stand is a nice touch. I would recommend purchasing a 5 iron though.
customer_reviews.author: Americanmullet

customer_reviews.title: Incredible set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set and havent regret one bit. I have been playing golf for only 3 months and these set is perfect to learn the game. The irons are very forgiving and the price cant be beat!! Recommend 100% to all beginners, and for only $150 you have a brand new full set to start the game.
customer_reviews.author: Huascar Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs. I got the set for men under 6' and they are almost as good as if I had them sized by a pro. Grips hold up well and all of the clubs feel sturdy. I'd expect to use these for a few years before having to do any work on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and perfect for my 17-year-old beginner. I was extremely impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this golf set for my 13 soon to be 14 year old son. He is enjoying it. The bag is perfect for his size
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself so I could have my own set when my husband and I went golfing. I’m 5’9” and these fit me great. These are a great set for the price! No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value clubs!
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are great! I don’t play very often so I wouldn’t consider myself an avid golfer, but these clubs look great and feel nice. Don’t waste your money on expensive clubs, especially if you only play for fun, these clubs are just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Messick

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Clubs For Newer Golfer
customer_reviews.text: I am just beginning to get back into golf after a 15 year hiatus. These have definitely improved my game and are a good value. I'll probably start adding new clubs as I can better (hopefully).
customer_reviews.author: mjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of clubs, well built. Bag is a decent bag, for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sonjarenee2001

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set of clubs.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted these. They are a nice set. All you need for the beginner.
customer_reviews.author: lori brandt

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Deal
customer_reviews.text: Getting a full set of clubs, with a decent bag and even graphite woods with covers at this price, is amazing. I’ve been out playing this set 6-7 games now, and couldn’t be more pleased. My golf partners have single DRIVERS that cost more than this whole set...and I can hit just as well, or better with every club. Can’t go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: david hunter

product_meta.title: Wilson Men's and Teen Complete Golf Set
feature_bullets: The super game improvement design focuses on generating more distance for beginner golfers
Large 460cc Titanium matrix driver uses hot face and low center of gravity to launch the ball off the Tee
Large sweet spot irons feature perimeter weighting for improved performance on off center hits
Alignment putter with soft Paddle grip improves aim and distance for all golfers
The lightweight, ergonomic bag features self activating stand and numerous pockets

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
